DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) carotid ultrasound examination : presence carotid plaque abnormal CIMT 0.9 1.2mm ; ( 2 ) lipid profile : LDL≦3.12mmol/L , TC≦5.2mmol/L ; ( 3 ) lipidlowering treatment within past 6 month . severe cardiomyopathy , acute coronary syndrome , hepatic dysfunction , endstage renal failure ( serum creatinine ≥117mmol/L ) , prior carotid endarterectomy , and/or patient agree participate present study .
